Guia_0303
Ana Clara Lonczynski - 0860668

a.) 10110(2) = X(10)

10110(2) - 1 = 10101
C2(10101(2)) = 0 1010(2) -> 10 (10)

b.) 110011(2) = X(10)

110011(2) - 1 = 110010
C2(110010(2)) = 0 01101(2) -> 13(10)

c.) 100100(2) = X(2)

100100(2) - 1 = 100011
C2(100011(2)) = 0 11100(2) 

d.) 1011011(2) = X(2)

1011011(2) - 1 = 1011010
C2(1011010(2)) = 0 100101(2)

e.) 1110011(2) = X(16)

1110011(2) - 1 = 1110010
C2(1110010(2)) = 0 001101(2) -> D(16)
